name: The Box (itch) (PntherArt)
description:
Created for Game a Week 9: Gift

Here's another game that draws on an extremely personal subject!  The person this game is dedicated to knows exactly who they are <3 love u bud :) cant wait to do this soon again! I have been doing this very activity since probably at least 2015.. so yep I am almost a pro at sending boxes to Norway.

If u feel like translating the message at the end it's in terribly translated Norwegian bc I such at norwegian.

Controls

Left click to make things happen!

ESC to close game is enabled when letter screen is up.

May also be mobile supported soonish? As always attributes in read me x
